messages.subject: R: [samuraihistory] Japnese Spears
messages.msgSnippet: Amendment. It was my mistake. The dot at the end of the URL was the problem. I m sorry. ... Da: Carlo Tacchini [mailto:TSUBAME1@TIN.IT] Inviato: domenica 3
messages.messageBody:
Amendment.
It was my mistake. The dot at the end of the URL was the problem.
I'm sorry.

-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: Carlo Tacchini [mailto:TSUBAME1@...]
Inviato: domenica 3 ottobre 2004 12.01
A: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Oggetto: R: [samuraihistory] Japnese Spears


Mr. Sinclaire, seems that this interesting link doesn't work.
Other persons are interested in, have you any other address for us about
this book ?

-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: Clive Sinclaire [mailto:CSinclaire@...]
Inviato: giovedì 23 settembre 2004 23.35
A: nihonto@yahoogroups.com; samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Cc: token_kenkyu_kai@...
Oggetto: [samuraihistory] Japnese Spears


Gentlemen and Ladies
I attendfed a lecture and book launch today given by Roald and Patricia
Knutsen for their jointly written new book JAPANESE SPEARS - Polearms
and their use in old Japan. It is, quote "a historical survey of
Naginata and Yari from the earliest times to the close of the Edo
period".
Published by Global Oriental Ltd I am not sure where it will be
available but the publisher's web-site is www.globaloriental.co.uk.
I have not, of course read it yet but we will be reviewing it for To-ken
Society of Great Britain in the near future.
Regards
Clive Sinclaire

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
